entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此漏洞允许攻击者在受影响的系统上执行任意命令，严重威胁系统安全。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： version <= 9.1R11.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/44dc91ac6ae0df9a0866bbef4d8dbcbc1972d5dc/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execut

entry.title: Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-9264

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2024-9264是Grafana中的一个严重远程代码执行漏洞，通过SQL表达式和DuckDB利用。此漏洞允许攻击者在易受攻击的Grafana实例上执行任意代码。修复版本解决了原始PoC中的语法错误和write_file()函数的不正确使用问题，并成功通过shellfs扩展写入和执行反向shell。

产品厂商： Grafana

产品名称： Grafana

影响版本： 11.0.0

来源： https://github.com/Exerrdev/CVE-2024-9264-Fixed

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • fpoc.py

来源概述

🛠️ CVE-2024-9264 - Fixed Grafana RCE Exploit

This is a fixed version of the proof-of-concept exploit for CVE-2024-9264, a critical remote code execution vulnerability in Grafana (via SQL expressions and DuckDB).

🔗 Original advisory: Grafana Security Release
❌ Original PoC: Broken due to syntax errors and incorrect use of write_file()
✅ This version works, tested on a vulnerable Grafana 11.0.0 instance.

✅ Fixes in this version

  • ✅ Correctly uses writefile() instead of write_file() (DuckDB function)
  • ✅ Proper shell payload using bash -i >& /dev/tcp/...
  • ✅ Reverse shell written and executed successfully via shellfs extension

📦 Requirements

  • Grafana instance with:
    • DuckDB backend
    • Ability to install shellfs from community
  • A netcat listener on your attacker machine

🚀 Usage

Then listen with:

⚠️ Legal Disclaimer

This project is for educational purposes only.
Do not use it against targets you do not have permission to test.

✍️ Author of this Fix

Modified and validated by Exerr — original PoC by z3k0sec.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：</

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure Bypass LFI y Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Bypass LFI y Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此模板尝试在多个常见的web可访问路径中写入JSP webshell，然后执行’id’命令以确认远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： version <= 9.1R11.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/41485124568acfbbf861dd3a329f0848d5de3969/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-0796

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) 在处理某些请求时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过网络访问SMBv3服务执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3)

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903”

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) contains a remote code execution caused by mishandling of certain requests in the SMBv3 protocol, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to SMBv3 service.

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. entry.title: PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于PHP FPM中，攻击者可以通过构造特定的请求，利用Metasploit框架中的exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce模块实现远程代码执行。由于新的PHP编码器”HEX”导致payload大小超出限制，使得该漏洞在当前Metasploit版本中不再有效。

产品厂商： PHP

产品名称： PHP FPM

影响版本： 7.2.19

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20310

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Steps to reproduce

How’d you do it?

  1. Victim: PHP 7.2.19, on Nginx 1.14.2 with FPM
  2. Attacker: Metasploit Framework v6.4.45-dev, using module exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce

-> Exploit worked reliable on older Metasploit versions

Expected behavior

Default settings, default target (PHP), default payload (meterpreter/reverse_tcp)
During check phase, the max payload length is determined being 1760 bytes
Payload gets sent and a meterpreter shell is opened

Current behavior

During check phase, max payload length is determined being 1760 bytes
Then payload is prepared and encoded via the new default PHP encoder “HEX”, which is larger (2270 bytes), making the exploit fail

Metasploit version

v6.4.45-dev

Additional Information

Output:

msf6 exploit(multi/http/php_fpm_rce) > run
[*] Started reverse TCP handler on 10.11.14.240:4444
[*] Sending baseline query…
[*] Detecting QSL…
[+] The target is probably vulnerable. Possible QSLs: [1765]
[*] Doing sanity check…
[*] Detecting attack parameters…
[+] Parameters found: QSL=1760, customh_length=31
[+] Target is vulnerable!
[*] Performing attack using php.ini settings…
[+] Success! Was able to execute a command by appending ‘which which’
[*] Trying to cleanup /tmp/y…
[+] Cleanup done!
[*] Sending payload…
[-] Exploit aborted due to failure: unknown: QSL value too small to fit the command: QSL=1760, qsl_delta=0, prefix (size=2270)=W=php%20-r%20%22eval(hex2bin(%%22));%22%26
[*] Exploit completed, but no session was created.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型：</

entry.title: QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-7194

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 存在外部控制文件名或路径的问题，原因是验证不足，允许远程攻击者访问或修改系统文件，利用需要远程网络访问。

产品厂商： QNAP

产品名称： Photo Station

搜索语法： content-length: 580 “http server 1.0”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12254

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

QNAP Photo Station contains an external control of file name or path caused by insufficient validation, letting remote attackers access or modify system files, exploit requires remote network access.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157857/QNAP-QTS-And-Photo-Station-6.0.3-Remote-Command-Execution.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: content-length: 580 "http server 1.0"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞

entry.title: Ivanti Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Ivanti Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-0282

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Ivanti Connect Secure < 22.7R2.5, Ivanti Policy Secure < 22.7R1.2, 以及 Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways < 22.7R2.3 存在一个由于不当输入处理导致的栈基缓冲区溢出漏洞，允许远程未认证攻击者通过发送特制请求执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Ivanti

产品名称： Ivanti Connect Secure, Ivanti Policy Secure, Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways

影响版本： Ivanti Connect Secure < 22.7R2.5, Ivanti Policy Secure < 22.7R1.2, Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways < 22.7R2.3

搜索语法： http.title:”ivanti connect secure”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12130

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Ivanti Connect Secure < 22.7R2.5, Ivanti Policy Secure < 22.7R1.2, and Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways < 22.7R2.3 contain a stack-based buffer overflow caused by improper input handling, letting remote unauthenticated attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending crafted requests.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://cloud.google.com/blog/topics/threat-intelligence/ivanti-connect-secure-vpn-zero-day
  • https://github.com/sfewer-r7/CVE-2025-0282
  • https://labs.watchtowr.com/exploitation-walkthrough-and-techniques-ivanti-connect-secure-rce-cve-2025-0282/
  • https://github.com/punitdarji/Ivanti-CVE-2025-0282
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/043030d6caa4
  • https://github.com/44xo/CVE-2025-0282
  • https///github.com:44xo/CVE-2025-0282.git
  • https://github.com/AdaniKamal/CVE-2025-0282
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/858b463ecabe
  • https://github.com/almanatra/CVE-2025-0282
  • https///github.com:almanatra/CVE-2025-0282.git
  • https://github.com/Hexastrike/Ivanti-Connect-Secure-Logs-Parser
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/d343e6784986
  • https///github.com:sfewer-r7/CVE-2025-0282.git
  • https://github.com/watchtowrlabs/CVE-2025-0282
  • https://github.com/rxwx/pulse-meter
  • https://github.com/AnonStorks/CVE-2025-0282-Full-version
  • https://github.com/absholi7ly/CVE-2025-0282-Ivanti-exploit

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"ivanti connect secure"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-7194

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前的版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。这包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。为了降低这些风险，QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新到最新可用版本。

产品厂商： QNAP

产品名称： QNAP Photo Station

影响版本： < 6.0.3

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.0R3/9.1R1及更高版本中的Windows文件共享浏览器和Pulse Secure协作功能存在认证绕过漏洞，允许未认证的攻击者执行远程任意代码，利用此漏洞需要访问易受攻击的功能。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： 9.0R3/9.1R1 and higher

搜索语法： http.title:”ivanti connect secure”

漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前的版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。这包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。为了减轻这些风险，QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新到最新可用版本。

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install功能存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，由于对Smart Install数据包数据的不当验证，未经认证的远程攻击者可以通过发送特制的Smart Install消息（TCP端口4786）触发设备重启、执行任意代码或导致无限循环。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12325

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software contain a buffer overflow caused by improper validation of Smart Install packet data, letting unauthenticated remote attackers trigger device reload, execute arbitrary code, or cause indefinite loops, exploit requires sending crafted Smart Install message on TCP port 4786.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6d4b443f23fc
  • https://github.com/AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit
  • https///github.com:AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow

entry.title: ISPConfig 代码注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ISPConfig 代码注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-46818

漏洞类型： 代码注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 在ISPConfig 3.2.11p1之前版本中发现了一个问题。如果启用了admin_allow_langedit，管理员可以通过语言文件编辑器实现PHP代码注入。

产品厂商： ISPConfig

产品名称： ISPConfig

影响版本： version <= 3.2.11

来源： https://github.com/z7Akane/CVE-2023-46818

类型： CVE-2023:github search

仓库文件

  • .gitignore
  • CVE-2023-46818.py
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2023-46818

An issue was discovered in ISPConfig before 3.2.11p1. PHP code injection can be achieved in the language file editor by an admin if admin_allow_langedit is enabled.

Usage

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-46818
  • https://www.ispconfig.org/blog/ispconfig-3-2-11p1-released
  • https://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2023/Dec/2

Credit

If you found this project useful or interesting, consider supporting it by giving a ⭐ to the repository!

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： ISPConfig 代码注入漏洞
